name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Joseph Bradley RATHFON, Appellant
docket_number: Appeals Nos. 54 and 55 W.D. Appeal Docket 1998

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO and NEWMAN, JJ.
Justice SAYLOR did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Joseph Bradley RATHFON, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 25th day of March, 1999, the appeal in the above captioned case is dismissed as improvidently granted.
Justice SAYLOR did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: John F. Marshall, Shippenville, for appellant.
George R. Kepple, Dist. Atty., for Com.
casebody.head_matter:
725 A.2d 1209
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Joseph Bradley RATHFON, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Jan. 28, 1999.
Decided March 25, 1999.
John F. Marshall, Shippenville, for appellant.
George R. Kepple, Dist. Atty., for Com.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO and NEWMAN, JJ.
